title: Nostōdia In serenissimi, potentissimi, et inuictissimi monarchae, Iacobi Magnæ Britanniæ, Franciæ & Hiberniæ Regis, fidei defensoris, &c. felicem in Scotiam reditum, Academiæ Edinburgiensis congratulatio.
author: University of Edinburgh.
notes: First word of title in Greek characters.
"Ad Iacobum Monarchum in Scotiam redeuntem epibaterion. Authore Adamo Regio." has separate undated title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
